instruction: Create a summary of the following text in no more than 4 lines.
input: The effect of gun violence in the United States is widespread. According to the CDC, in 2018 there were 38,390 deaths due to firearm. Of these, 24,432 were suicides. The rate of firearm deaths per 100,000 people increased from 10.3 per 100,000 in 1999 to 12 per 100,000 in 2017.
output: Gun violence in the United States is a major problem. According to the CDC, in 2018 there were 38,390 deaths due to firearm, with 24,432 deaths being suicides. The rate of firearm deaths rose from 10.3 per 100,000 people in 1999 to 12 per 100,000 in 2017.
